title: Golden Ashe Chroma

replies.body:
As I understand it, the Championship Ashe Golden Chroma may come back at some point in the future, and only the icon and loading screen border will not be returning.

> This skin will return to the store every year during Worlds, but the icon and loading screen border will only be available this year. 2017 is also your best chance to unlock her Golden Chroma and Ward, which will become legacy content following the tournament; note that you’ll need to either complete Worlds Master Pass missions or pick up extra tokens from Hextech Chests bundles from Oct 25 – Nov 6 to hit 320 Worlds Tokens.

http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/worlds-hits-the-rift-2017/

Hope that answers your question!
